mcq.statement: Choose the sentence that is grammatically correct from the options provided: I wish I could find a way to make amends and secure a better afterlife.

options.a: I wish I could find a way to make amends and secure a better afterlife.
options.b: I hope that my life will become more exciting in the time I have left.
options.c: I fear that my lack of excitement will lead to a dull eternity.
options.d: I wonder if there's still time to make a positive impact and change my fate.
